#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,k=0,n,m,i,j;
	double x,z;
	long l;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--){
		
		k++;
		printf("Case %d:\n",k);
		scanf("%d",&n);
		scanf("%d",&m);
		//long arr[n];
	vector<long long>arr;
//		memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%lf",&x);
			//arr[i]=x*100;
			arr.push_back(x*100.0+.5);
		}
		sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
		reverse(arr.begin(),arr.end());
		for(i=0;i<m;i++){
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
			scanf("%lf",&z);
			//cin>>str;
			//l=str.length();
			//cout<<z*(100.00)<<"\n";
			 long long z1=(long long)(z*(100.00)+.5);
			//cout<<"z1="<<z1<<"\n";
			for(j=0;j<n;j++){
				//cout<<j<<arr[j]<<"\n";
				l=z1/arr[j];
				z1%=arr[j];
				if(l>0){
					//l=(long)z1/arr[j];
					//z1=z1-l*arr[j];
					//cout<<z1<<"\n";
					//z1%=arr[j];
					//int y=arr[j]-((int)(arr[j]/100.0))*100.0;
					if(arr[j]<100)
					printf("%.2lf %ld\n",(double)(arr[j]*1.00)/100.0,l);
					else 
					printf("%lld %ld\n",(long long)arr[j]/100,l);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
